languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, эти методы могут быть жестокими, но их эффективность доказана столетиями практики. Ни один преступник не сознается, если его просто вежливо попросить. Но если ему раздробить палец и любезно напомнить, сколько нераздробленных костей у него еще осталось... Это уже совсем иной разговор. Так рождается истина".

"Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, эти методы могут быть жестокими, но их эффективность доказана столетиями практики. Ни один преступник не сознается, если его просто вежливо попросить. Но если ему раздробить палец и любезно напомнить, сколько нераздробленных костей у него еще осталось... Это уже совсем иной разговор. Так рождается истина".

But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

languages.text: “舰长大人，这样的手段可能确实很野蛮，但这些手段行之有效，已经经过了数百年的时间考验。如果礼貌地询问那些罪犯的话，他们是绝对不会招供的，但如果碾碎他们的手指，同时礼貌地提醒他们还剩多少根没被碾碎的骨头……那他们的态度就完全不一样了。真相就是这样发现的。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这样的手段可能确实很野蛮，但这些手段行之有效，已经经过了数百年的时间考验。如果礼貌地询问那些罪犯的话，他们是绝对不会招供的，但如果碾碎他们的手指，同时礼貌地提醒他们还剩多少根没被碾碎的骨头……那他们的态度就完全不一样了。真相就是这样发现的。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, puede que estos métodos sean brutales, pero su eficacia se ha probado de sobra con el paso de los siglos. Ningún criminal confiesa si se le pregunta con cortesía. Pero si se le rompe el dedo y se le recuerda educadamente cuántos huesos le quedan intactos en el cuerpo... Entonces la conversación discurre por otros derroteros. Así es como se obtiene la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, puede que estos métodos sean brutales, pero su eficacia se ha probado de sobra con el paso de los siglos. Ningún criminal confiesa si se le pregunta con cortesía. Pero si se le rompe el dedo y se le recuerda educadamente cuántos huesos le quedan intactos en el cuerpo... Entonces la conversación discurre por otros derroteros. Así es como se obtiene la verdad».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、 これらの方法は残忍かもしれませんが、何世紀にもわたって有効だと実証されてきました。どんな犯罪者でも、丁寧に尋ねれば自白しません。しかし、相手の指を砕き、砕けずに残っている骨の数を丁寧に思い出させれば…違う話です。そうやって真実は生まれるのです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、 これらの方法は残忍かもしれませんが、何世紀にもわたって有効だと実証されてきました。どんな犯罪者でも、丁寧に尋ねれば自白しません。しかし、相手の指を砕き、砕けずに残っている骨の数を丁寧に思い出させれば…違う話です。そうやって真実は生まれるのです」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, diese Methoden mögen brutal sein, aber ihre Effizienz hat sich über Jahrhunderte hinweg bewährt. Kein Krimineller wird gestehen, wenn Ihr ihn freundlich darum bittet. Wenn man ihm aber den Finger bricht und ihn freundlich daran erinnert, wie viele Knochen seines Körpers noch nicht gebrochen sind ... Das ist eine ganz andere Gesprächsgrundlage. So wird die Wahrheit geboren."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, diese Methoden mögen brutal sein, aber ihre Effizienz hat sich über Jahrhunderte hinweg bewährt. Kein Krimineller wird gestehen, wenn Ihr ihn freundlich darum bittet. Wenn man ihm aber den Finger bricht und ihn freundlich daran erinnert, wie viele Knochen seines Körpers noch nicht gebrochen sind ... Das ist eine ganz andere Gesprächsgrundlage. So wird die Wahrheit geboren."

languages.text: « Ces méthodes peuvent paraître brutales, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais en plusieurs siècles de pratique, leur efficacité ne s'est jamais démentie. Aucun criminel ne passera aux aveux si vous le lui demandez gentiment. En revanche, si vous lui brisez un doigt tout en lui rappelant poliment le nombre d'os encore intacts qui lui reste dans le corps... La conversation prend un tout autre tournant, et c'est ainsi que la vérité se fait jour. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."

La conversation prend un tout autre tournant, et c'est ainsi que la vérité se fait jour. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bu yöntemler acımasız olabilir ancak asırlar boyunca uygulanmaları neticesinde ne kadar verimli oldukları kanıtlandı. Hiçbir suçlu, kibarca sorguya çektiğinizde itirafta bulunmaz. Ancak parmaklarını paramparça edip bedenlerinde daha kaç tane kırılmamış kemik olduğunu nazikçe hatırlatırsanız... Bu, başlı başına farklı bir konuşmaya yol açar. Hakikat, işte bu şekilde doğar."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these methods may be brutal, but their effectiveness has been proven over centuries of practice. No criminal will confess if you ask them politely. But if you shatter their finger and courteously remind them how many unshattered bones they still have left in their body... That is a different conversation altogether. That is how the truth is born."
